titleStmt.title: By the Quene the Quenes Maiestie beyng infourmed, that in some partes of her realme, sundrye either ignoraunt or malicious people do spreade rumours abrode that the base testons of fourpence halfpenye should not be currant after thende of Ianuary next ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprinted at London in Powles Churchyarde :

notesStmt.note: Last complete line of text ends "that".
Other title information from first 4 lines of text.
"Yeuen at her hyghnesse Palyce at Westminster, the xxiii. day of December."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
